original_text: Every day he walked back and forth near the courtyard of the harem to find out how Esther was and what was happening to her.
korean_text: 모르드개가 날마다 후궁 뜰 앞으로 왕래하며 에스더의 안부와 어떻게 될지를 알고자 하였더라

sentences.original_text: Every day he walked back and forth
near the courtyard of the harem
to find out how Esther was
and what was happening to her
sentences.korean_translation: 그리고 그녀에게 무슨 일이 일어나는지 알아보았다
